p: We found that the prevention and control processes of the COVID-19 epidemic led to ethical issues, such as breaches of patients’ privacy . This significantly affected patients’ mental state and led to social problems ( El Emam et al., 2011). In addition, problems with medical ethical issues such as the right to patient informed consent during diagnosis and treatment occurred, which cannot be ignored ( Aliakbari et al., 2015). As such, ethical support and integrity during the outbreak of an epidemic must be further strengthened.
